metadata.Title: CVE-2012-5472 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
lib/formslib.php in Moodle 2.2.x before 2.2.6 and 2.3.x before 2.3.3 allowsremote authenticated users to bypass intended access restrictions via amodified value of a frozen form field.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5472` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.2.6.dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.6.dfsg-1').
